ED_Title: Notification by the Secretary-General under Article 12, paragraph 2, of the Charter of the United Nations
ED_DecisionText: At its 79th plenary meeting, on 9 June 2022, the General Assembly took note of the note by the Secretary-General.  (footnote: A/76/300.)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
